topics.body:
Even trying to get him to watch Godzilla 2014, he just kept asking, "So when does Godzilla show up?", over and over.

And when Godzilla does show up on screen, he starts yelling "Godzilla!" in a dumb voice, so clearly his enjoyment of the series is only for the bad dubbing, or funny sounding Japanese

Like when anyone is just talking in the movie, he doesn't pay attention or wouldn't stop talking, and asks "What's going on?" because he wasn't paying any fucking attention
